translation.en: Meow.
-[indistinct chatter] -[grunting]
Blast it.
[Merlin] Hisirdoux!
-[yells, grunts] -What have we talked about?
"Magic isn't a permissible shortcut to hard work."
translation.de: "Magie ist kein Ersatz für harte Arbeit."

translation.en: Carry on, and don't…
-But, Master-- -…"but, Master" me.
I'm just-- I know I'm capable of more than just pushing a broom.
translation.de: Ich... Ich weiß, dass ich mehr kann, als nur Besen zu schwingen.

translation.en: Teach me to be a proper sorcerer!
If there is a universal truth in this world,
it is that struggle is the flame which forges one's soul into steel.
translation.de: Anstrengung ist die Flamme, die eine Seele zu Stahl macht.

translation.en: Magic cannot be a crutch.
To take the easy way out is to merely exist, Hisirdoux.
translation.de: Wenn man den leichten Weg nimmt, existiert man nur, Hisirdoux.

translation.en: So, why am I learning spells if I'm not supposed to use them?
I wanna be a wizard like you!
translation.de: Ich will auch ein Zauberer sein!

translation.en: With a staff and everything!
Staffs are for those with mastery over magic,
translation.de: Stäbe sind für die, die die Zauberei beherrschen.

translation.en: and magic is mastery over life.
So first, you must learn how to live.
translation.de: Du musst erst lernen zu leben.

translation.en: Master that lesson, and I vow your days of pushing brooms will be over.
translation.de: Wenn du das schaffst, musst du keine Besen mehr schwingen.

translation.en: [sighs] Blast it.
"Magic isn't a permissible shortcut to hard work."
translation.de: "Magie ist kein Ersatz für harte Arbeit."

translation.en: -'Night, Doux! Thanks for cleaning up! -Of course!
Right, time for the real work.
-You ready? -[meows]
[laughs] 'Tis my cleanest capture yet!
Aren't you a nasty little beast?
I figured an umber imp was the reason for all those lost pets.
translation.de: Der Umber-Kobold hat die Haustiere gefressen.

translation.en: That is not an umber imp.
Do you notice the three mandibles?
How it's phasing in and out of existence? That's a shadow mephit.
translation.de: Wie er plötzlich erscheint? Das ist ein Schattenmephit.

translation.en: And you should know your monsterology if you're going to use me as bait.
translation.de: Wenn du die nicht kennst, benutz mich nicht als Köder!

translation.en: Either way, let's take a sec to recognize that I've--
we've done some very good magic tonight.
-Douxie, old pal-- -No, no, no, revel in the victory.
We're unappreciated, Arch, silent sentinels keeping the world safe from specters and demons and--
translation.de: Wir werden verkannt, Archie, wir stille Wachen, die die Welt schützen.

translation.en: It's out of the trap, isn't it?
[Archie] Your capture technique is still weak, and you could use a couple more centuries of practice.
translation.de: An deinen Fallen solltest du noch ein paar Jahrhunderte üben.

translation.en: I will not be lectured by someone who licks their own butt!
translation.de: -Sei still, du leckst deinen Hintern! -Ich putze mich!

translation.en: -[Archie] It's hygienic! -No, no, not this one.
translation.de: -Sei still, du leckst deinen Hintern! -Ich putze mich! Nein, nicht der!

translation.en: Yes! Yes, yes, yes!
Let's see you phase through this, you little git!
translation.de: Mal sehen, ob du da durchkommst!

translation.en: [chuckles] Got you-- This totally worked on that specterghast.
translation.de: Hab dich! Beim Geisterirrwicht ging das.

translation.en: [Archie] Back in Babylon. That was a fun night. Heads up!
translation.de: In Babylon. Das war cool. Kopf!

translation.en: No, it had five heads. [grunts] Arch!
translation.de: Nein, er hatte fünf Köpfe! Archie!

translation.en: Fuzz buckets! [grunting]
It's working!
I've-- I've almost… [grunting]
worn him down! [screams]
Uh… I've-- I've got it! I've got it! I've…
Also, unlike umber imps, mephits are vulnerable to fire.
Saucy midge.
Your pet-munching days are over!
-Say "hi" to everyone in limbo for me. -[squealing]
translation.de: Sag allen in der Vorhölle "Hi" von mir!

translation.en: You're welcome, Arcadia!
Strange. A lone shadow mephit snacking on pets.
Where there's one, there's usually more.
[Merlin] Hisirdoux…
Merlin? Yes!
Finally, Arch! Our moment has arrived!
translation.de: Endlich, Archie! Es ist so weit!

translation.en: Master Merlin.
Hisirdoux, my faithful apprentice, I need--
You're darn right I've been faithful! I've been mopping for a millennium!
translation.de: Ja, ich bin treu! Ich putze seit tausend Jahren!

translation.en: Why didn't you send a raven or a text? There's texting now, you know.
translation.de: Schicken Sie doch eine Nachricht. Heute gibt es SMS.

translation.en: -I was busy, as you know. -Yeah?
Well, I've been quite busy, too,
protecting the material plane while you weren't around.
-Hisirdoux, I need you-- -About time. I've been practicing my incantations and my spells--
translation.de: -Hisirdoux, ich brauche... -Endlich. Ich habe die Sprüche geübt...

translation.en: Enough! Matters are most dire!
I need you to bring me the Guardians of Arcadia, with haste!
translation.de: Du musst mir sofort die Hüter von Arcadia bringen!

translation.en: Oh, it's our moment, all right, as errand boys.
Man, the rest of this summer's gonna eat farts.
translation.de: Der Rest vom Sommer wird sicher voll langweilig.

translation.en: Yeah, it is kind of hard to top destroying an alien god.
translation.de: Gegen einen Aliengott kämpft man nicht jeden Tag.

translation.en: Wingman did good. Proud.
But I lost my butt-stomping, ninja-space-angel girlfriend and my creepslaying partner in the same afternoon.
translation.de: Ich habe meine Ninja-Freundin verloren! Und meinen monsterkillenden Partner!

translation.en: Yeah, I felt like that after Jim and Claire and everybody left on their quest--
translation.de: So habe ich mich gefühlt, als Jim und Claire gegangen sind.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, we're talking about my problems here, buttsnack.
translation.de: Hey, hey, hey, wir reden hier über meine Probleme!

translation.en: Cat! Yum.
Ooh, hey, little guy!
You lost? Beware. You, you are in grave danger.
translation.de: -Hast du dich verirrt? -Vorsicht! Ihr seid in ernster Gefahr.

translation.en: Whoa! A cat with glasses! The cat just talked and you're focused on its eyewear?
translation.de: -Eine Katze mit Brille! -Sie spricht! Vergiss die Brille!

translation.en: I've seen aliens, creeps, and trolls, Domzalski.
translation.de: Ich habe Aliens, Monster und Trolle gesehen.

translation.en: So, yeah, I'd like to know why the talking cat's wearing glasses.
translation.de: Ich will wissen, warum die Katze eine Brille trägt.

translation.en: Bad eyesight.
Not cat. Familiar.
"Familiar"? [chuckles] No way. I'd remember if I met a cat with glasses.
translation.de: "Begleiter"? Auf keinen Fall. An die Katze würde ich mich erinnern.

translation.en: No. Wizard assistant.
"Assistant"? That's very offensive.
I am a wizard associate, thank you very much. Now, come with me or the worst will come to pass.
translation.de: Ich bin der Partner eines Zauberers. Kommt mit. Das ist ein Befehl.

translation.en: Hey! Are you threatening me, pussycat?
No, I'm warning you.
Put simply, the world as you know it is about to end.
translation.de: Kurz gesagt: Die Welt, wie ihr sie kennt, wird enden.

translation.en: Meow.
[Toby] Wha…
Aw, not again! [yelling]
Sorry, this is a lot to process!
Pets can talk? The world is ending? Again?
translation.de: Sprechende Tiere? Die Welt endet schon wieder?

translation.en: Not the best timing, I know, but we need your help all the same.
translation.de: Schlechtes Timing, aber wir brauchen euch.

translation.en: Douxie? Wai-- Hold up!
I thought you worked at the cafe or were, like, a model or something.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du kellnerst oder modelst.

translation.en: [chuckles] There's a lot about me you don't know.
translation.de: Es gibt viel, was ihr nicht wisst.

translation.en: -Whoa! -What?
Come on, then.
The answers to all your questions are within.
Yeah, right. In a bookstore?
[Toby] Ah! There's flying books.
Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
translation.de: Oh mein Gott! Oh mein Gott!

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
translation.de: Oh Gott! Oh Gott! Oh Gott!

translation.en: So cool! So cool! So cool!
-Ooh, what's that? -[Merlin] Put that down!
Thank the ether you're here.
We haven't a moment to waste.
-[Toby laughing] -Whoa! Crusty, creepy dude! Though, I had hoped for more, Hisirdoux.
translation.de: -Oh! Alter Kauz! -Ich hatte mehr erhofft, Hisirdoux.

translation.en: I tried. I couldn't find the changelings or the aliens. I'm pretty sure most left the planet.
translation.de: Ich habe sonst niemand gefunden. Sie haben wohl den Planeten verlassen.

translation.en: Merlin, it's me-- Toby Domzalski!
You know, War Hammer, Guardian of Arcadia, Geology Club president.
No one could forget you, chatty.
And Steve Palchuk, Creepslayer!
-I have no idea who you are. -[Palchuk yelps]
[Merlin] But we're desperate. Thankfully, we have the brute.
translation.de: Gut, dass wir den Großen haben.

translation.en: -Yum! [grunts] -I'm not anybody's lunch. Got it?
translation.de: Lecker! Ich bin kein Essen! Verstanden?

translation.en: Wait, where's Jimbo and Claire?
I thought they were with you.
Answers forthcoming.
Make preparations. We've a journey ahead.
translation.de: Macht euch bereit für die Reise.

translation.en: -And don't… -But, Master--
…"but, Master" me.
But… are you sure you want to count on these children?
translation.de: Aber... Wollen Sie sich auf diese unerfahrenen Kinder verlassen?

translation.en: -They're clearly not ready for this. -[scoffs] Excuse me, college dude,
translation.de: Aber... Wollen Sie sich auf diese unerfahrenen Kinder verlassen? Entschuldige, College-Junge,

translation.en: these children fought off a 50-foot extraterrestrial! [screams]
translation.de: wir haben gegen einen 15 Meter großen Außerirdischen gekämpft!

translation.en: Dude, let go of its head!
-[Palchuk] It's got my head, too, man! -Just put it back!
-Master, I'm ready for this. -Doubtful.
-I've spent years preparing, centuries-- -Silence!
I mean, silence, all of you.
Can you not hear that?
Something wicked this way comes.
translation.de: Das Böse kommt auf leisen Sohlen.

translation.en: [Merlin] Shadow mephits?
-Hisirdoux, did you lead them here? -No, no!
-I mean, I don't think so? [chuckles] -Yes, we did.
He found us. The barrier won't hold for long.
translation.de: Er ist es. Wir haben nicht viel Zeit.

translation.en: We must make egress! Tobias, take my things!
translation.de: Wir müssen hier weg! Tobias, nimm meine Sachen!

translation.en: All of you, to the roof!
Hisirdoux, I said get to safety.
-I've got this. I can help. -Ugh.
Still trying to earn that staff, are you?
translation.de: Du willst immer noch den Stab, oder?

translation.en: Yeah. I've learned a thing or two since we last met.
translation.de: Ja. Ich habe inzwischen einiges gelernt.

translation.en: Use the Flux Rune Second. -It's stronger. -All right! I knew that!
translation.de: -Kraftfluss-Zauber Nr. 2! Der ist stärker! -Das wusste ich!

translation.en: -Douxie! -Arch!
-[Archie] I'm fine. No need to worry. -[grunts]
Fire?
Yeah. Magic fire!
In a bookstore?
-But mephits are vulnerable to fire-- -Move it!
Stand back!
[Palchuk] Whoa!
Ship just got real!
-[Aaarrrgghh] Everyone on! -[screaming, grunting]
Look out! [grunts]
Awesome sauce!
This is so cool!
What the heck is that?
Welcome, young squires, to Camelot.
[Toby] Camelot?
As in ancient-old-people-times Camelot?
Excuse me, I have a question. How is this castle flying right now?
translation.de: Ich hätte eine Frage. Wie kann die Burg da fliegen?

translation.en: [Merlin] The Heart of Avalon.
Its magic keeps Camelot aloft, powered by time itself.
translation.de: Seine Magie lässt Camelot schweben. Es wird von der Zeit selbst angetrieben.

translation.en: Sir Galahad, how look the skies?
translation.de: Sir Galahad, wie sieht der Himmel aus?

translation.en: All quiet, my old friend!
[Merlin] Keep your eyes on the horizon.
I say, coming in a little hot, don't you think?
translation.de: Wir sind etwas zu schnell, oder?

translation.en: Rubbish!
[Toby] Whoa!
It's been 900 years since I was last here.
translation.de: Ich war seit 900 Jahren nicht mehr hier.

translation.en: Hasn't changed a bit.
-Except for the flying part. -[chuckles]
"Nine hundred years"? Yeah, right.
You're like, what? Like, 19?
Give or take a few centuries.
[Palchuk] So, how many things can your cat turn into?
translation.de: In was kann sich deine Katze verwandeln?

translation.en: [Douxie] That depends. How many things are there?
translation.de: Kommt darauf an. Was gibt es alles?

translation.en: [Toby] Uh, cool floating castle ship, but what's the grave danger you keep talking about?
translation.de: Coole fliegende Schiffburg, aber warum sind wir alle in Gefahr?

translation.en: Ah, there you are.
-Not so tight. -Oh, sorry.
Whoa, hey, Steve's here, too! How 'bout-- how 'bout some love for Steve?
translation.de: Hey, Steve ist auch hier! Keiner begrüßt Steve?

translation.en: What happened to you guys?
-Wait, where's Jim? -[sighs]
Jim…
What happened to him?
[Blinky] We were ambushed.
Some ancient, dark warrior.
An unstoppable knight clad in green…
-[scream echoes] -…who struck down Master Jim.
Master, is that the same knight we saw at the bookstore?
translation.de: Ist das der Ritter aus dem Buchladen?

translation.en: One and the same.
That onyx shard is working its way towards his heart.
translation.de: Die Onyx-Scherbe bewegt sich auf sein Herz zu.

translation.en: I placed the boy in stasis, stalling its progress… for now.
translation.de: Ich habe seine Zeit angehalten, um sie vorerst zu stoppen.

translation.en: If I had my Shadow Staff, I could've saved him.
translation.de: Mit meinem Schattenstab hätte ich ihn retten können.

translation.en: Who is this Green Knight? How do I get my hands on him?
translation.de: Wer ist der grüne Ritter? Wie kriege ich ihn?

translation.en: I do not know.
The Green Knight said but one name, which chilled me to the bone.
translation.de: Der grüne Ritter sagte nur einen Namen, der mich erzittern ließ.

translation.en: [Green Knight] Morgana…
Oh, I hate that lady.
Wait, I thought we kicked her bee witch butt to the Shadow Realm.
translation.de: Aber sie ist doch im Schattenreich!

translation.en: Which he appeared not to know, but he bore the emblem of Camelot.
translation.de: Das weiß er wohl nicht. Aber er trug das Wappen von Camelot.

translation.en: Come with me, quickly. I fear the answer lies in the past.
translation.de: Kommt, schnell. Ich fürchte, die Antwort liegt in der Vergangenheit.

translation.en: A dark menace is coming,
one even I cannot face alone.
translation.de: und nicht mal ich habe allein eine Chance.

translation.en: You are all now soldiers in a war started centuries ago
translation.de: Ihr seid jetzt Soldaten in einem Krieg, der vor Jahrhunderten begann.

translation.en: for the world of magic.
Once, the realms of Magic and Man clashed in endless bloodshed.
translation.de: Einst kämpften das Reich der Magie und das Menschenreich gegeneinander.

translation.en: King Arthur sought to wipe out magic that ravaged the lands in his war against Gunmar.
translation.de: König Artus wollte die Magie auslöschen, die im Kampf gegen Gunmar alles zerstörte.

translation.en: I brought what few spellcasters I could under my protection to spare them from the sword…
translation.de: Ich nahm einige wenige Zauberer in Schutz, um sie vor dem Tod zu retten...

translation.en: Including myself.
Oh, and Morgana le Fay.
She was the finest student I ever taught…
until she tried to kill me.
Thankfully, in my all-seeing wisdom, I created a secret weapon--
translation.de: Dank meiner allsehenden Weisheit konnte ich eine Geheimwaffe schaffen...

translation.en: the Trollhunter amulet.
The war came to a standstill
and I imprisoned Morgana at the Battle of Killahead Bridge.
translation.de: und ich nahm Morgana beim Kampf von Killahead Bridge gefangen.

translation.en: [Merlin] This Green Knight that assailed us -was clearly born of dark magicks… -[gasps]
translation.de: Der grüne Ritter, der uns angriff, stammt aus der schwarzen Magie.

translation.en: …but I have no memory of him
translation.de: Aber ich erinnere mich nicht an ihn,

translation.en: nor what connection he could have to Morgana.
translation.de: oder welche Verbindung er zu Morgana hat.

translation.en: We know not what he is nor why he pursues us.
translation.de: Wir wissen nicht, wer er ist, oder was er von uns will.

translation.en: Though, his presence is a dire omen of things to come. -[bell ringing] -[all gasp]
translation.de: Aber seine Anwesenheit ist ein schlechtes Omen für die Zukunft.

translation.en: -What's happening? -Have you never been under attack before?
translation.de: -Was ist los? -Wurdest du noch nie angegriffen?

translation.en: To the battlements!
[Palchuk grunts] Yeah! Battlements, totally!
What is a battlement?
[automated voice] I'm sorry, I couldn't find "bagel mints." Battlements!
-What the…? -[Archie] Oh, no!
I think we have something of a problem.
translation.de: Ich glaube, wir haben ein Problem.

translation.en: [Douxie] Oh, fuzz buckets.
[Merlin] No… the Arcane Order…
they found us.
Everyone, get to safety, now!
[grunts] My staff!
I've got it!
-[grunts] -I lost it!
-[grunts] -Man the cannons!
We must flee!
[Douxie] I'm on it! [grunts] I've got it, I've got it, I've got it.
They're boarding us!
We must break free!
-Steer us clear at my command! -[Douxie] I'm on it!
All of a sudden, flying castles aren't so cool!
translation.de: Eine fliegende Burg ist doch nicht so cool!

translation.en: Master Jim!
-[screams] -Blinky!
-Have you found the staff? -[Archie] I'm on it!
translation.de: -Hast du den Stab gefunden? -Ich bin dabei!

translation.en: [grunts] Got you, Jim!
These foes' powers are beyond us!
translation.de: Unsere Feinde sind viel stärker als wir!

translation.en: -[Nari] Merlin! -No! Nari!
-[grunts] -This is all my fault.
I will take us to the past, but you must help me.
translation.de: Ich bringe uns zurück. Du musst mir helfen.

translation.en: I will do what I can.
[Claire] We've got to protect Jim! I'm not losing him again!
translation.de: Wir müssen Jim beschützen! Ich verliere ihn nicht wieder!

translation.en: -Feel the wrath of the hammer! -[Claire yelling]
[Palchuk] Die, creeper!
Where's the staff? Where's the staff?
translation.de: Wo ist der Stab? Wo ist er?

translation.en: Archie, find the staff or we are all dead meat!
translation.de: Archie, finde den Stab oder wir sind alle tot!

translation.en: [Archie] What do you people think I'm doing?
translation.de: Was glaubt ihr, was ich mache?

translation.en: Archie, I'm running out of time, here!
translation.de: Archie, die Zeit wird langsam knapp!

translation.en: [Archie] Got it!
Surrender, Merlin. [chuckles]
-Never. -[Galahad] Merlin!
Get everyone to safety!
-[yells] -No, Galahad! What are you doing?!
Farewell, my old friend.
Hisirdoux, now!
Please don't blow us up. Please don't blow us up.
We don't have enough power for the jump!
[Douxie] Trust in Merlin!
Hold together. Come on!
[grunts] We have to steer Camelot through the time rift!
translation.de: Wir müssen Camelot durch den Zeitriss lenken!

translation.en: [Green Knight] It ends…
now!
Oh, sod it all.
[Claire] Jim!
-What do we do, man? -Trust me!
Wait! No, no, no! [screams]
Flying castles suck!
-[Palchuk screams] -[Archie] Douxie!
Oh, no!
Curses, Hisirdoux, you were supposed to steer us to safety!
translation.de: Hisirdoux, du solltest uns in Sicherheit bringen!

translation.en: Must I always do everything myself?
translation.de: Muss ich immer alles selbst machen?

translation.en: Wh-- Where's the Trollhunter?
They fell right through the portal.
translation.de: Sie sind durch das Portal gefallen!

translation.en: -Where did they go? -Great Gronka Morka…
I fear it's not a question of where, but rather when.
translation.de: Die Frage ist nicht wohin, sondern wann.

translation.en: Oh, come on! Come on!
This is gonna hurt!
[Palchuk screams] It… does… hurt!
-[Palchuk] Oh, God… -[Douxie groans, grunts]
I can't see! I'm blind!
translation.de: Ich sehe nichts! Ich bin blind!

translation.en: Oh, I can see.
[Palchuk] What just happened?
Well, I just conjured an anti-gravity spell to slow our fall and keep us from dying.
translation.de: Ich hab uns mit dem Antigravitationszauber das Leben gerettet.

translation.en: You're welcome.
Douxie, where is the flying castle?
translation.de: Douxie, wo ist die fliegende Burg?

translation.en: Oh, fuzz buckets!
Well, it would appear we've had ourselves a temporal accident.
translation.de: Wir haben wohl einen zeitlichen Unfall gehabt.

translation.en: -Which means? -[Palchuk whimpers]
-[gasps] -[man1] Advance! [man 2] Got them.
-[Palchuk screams] -It means…
we are lost in time.
[man 3] What manner of sorcery is this?
translation.de: Was für ein Hexenwerk ist das?

translation.en: Oh-- Oh, my…
